cmmc_implementation.name: CMMC Implementation
cmmc_implementation.description: CMMC v2 compliance monitoring system with USB event tracking and cybersecurity monitoring

timeline.next_milestone: Deploy fixed authentication across all systems

current_challenges: PowerShell script type casting errors (op_Addition method issues)
InfluxDB 401 Unauthorized errors with org ID 4be0c8141e6cdb52
Inconsistent authentication between org name 'AIM' and org ID
next_steps: Fix PowerShell arithmetic operations in USB event processing
Standardize InfluxDB authentication (AIM vs org ID)
Complete Telegraf upgrades across all endpoints
Deploy comprehensive monitoring to all CMMC systems
notes: Core monitoring pipeline is functional despite errors
PowerShell remoting configured for enterprise deployment

jobai_system.name: JobAI System for Machining Company
jobai_system.description: AI-powered manufacturing analysis system for job scheduling, vendor operations, and workload optimization
features: Vendor operations tracking and risk assessment
Workload capacity analysis and bottleneck detection
current_challenges: Guest user access limitations in Teams environment
PowerBI API authentication for external access
Browser compatibility for read-only Excel users
next_steps: Deploy PowerBI Web API for direct data access
Implement JavaScript interface in Excel browser
Test guest user workflow in Teams environment
notes: Previous iteration used separate views (vw_ActiveJobsForAnalysis, etc.)
Enhanced system includes ship date integration and improved intelligence
Designed for manufacturing job analysis (example: Job 1317549)
Browser-based deployment targets guest users without full access

excel_dashboards.name: Excel Dashboards
excel_dashboards.description: Manufacturing machine status dashboards with real-time monitoring and color-coded status indicators

status_definitions.OFFLINE: Job complete OR available for new work

next_steps: Deploy across all machine monitoring dashboards
notes: Focus on visual clarity for shop floor users

powerbi_data_connectivity.name: PowerBI Data Connectivity via SQL Views
powerbi_data_connectivity.description: Enterprise data connectivity architecture using PowerBI with On-Prem Data Gateway for SQL Server integration

timeline.current_milestone: Optimize refresh performance and incremental updates

technical_details.architecture: SQL Server → PowerBI Service → Excel Online → Teams
sql_views: Multiple manufacturing and business intelligence views

current_issues: Slow refresh times for large datasets
optimization_approaches: Use date/timestamp filtering for modified data only
Optimize SQL view indexing and execution plans

current_challenges: Guest user data access in Teams
Managing data volumes across multiple connection points
notes: Guest users access Excel in read-only mode through browser
PowerBI API direct access bypasses Excel for some use cases
Critical for supporting JobAI system and dashboards
Foundation for multiple business intelligence initiatives

cross_project_dependencies.relationship: JobAI system depends on PowerBI connectivity for data access
Excel dashboards consume data through PowerBI connections
JobAI provides analysis triggered from Excel dashboard interfaces
